meanings.definition: The act or process of quantifying.
meanings.sent1: Her quantifications of the data helped us understand the results better.
meanings.sent2: The scientist made precise quantifications of the chemicals in the experiment.
meanings.sent3: During the game, his quantifications of the score were always off by a little.
meanings.sent4: The artist's quantifications of color in the painting created a beautiful harmony.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's quantifications of the students' progress were detailed and insightful.

meanings.sent1: The quantifications of apples in the basket showed there were ten.
meanings.sent2: She needed to make accurate quantifications of the expenses for the project.
meanings.sent3: His quantifications of the number of stars in the sky were always changing.
meanings.sent4: The quantifications of happiness cannot be measured in material possessions.
meanings.sent5: The quantifications of time spent with loved ones are priceless.
